amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit the Attorney General to postpone phasing out the Federal Prison Industries mandatory source rule for at least one year if it can be determined that the phase out would significantly threaten prison operations or prison safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record on Wednesday, November 5, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green (WI) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 91 - 325 (Roll no. 610).
